title: Why Everyone is WRONG About the PS5 and Series X
description: What are your thought's on Epic's new Unreal 5 engine on PS5? Can the Xbox Series X Beat PS5?  Does Austin Evans ACTUALLY Know Phones?  Is It REALLY Time to Ditch Chrome?  This Tech Is Older than You Think:  Trying the $166 iPhone 11 Pro from Wish:   Subscribe!  Twitter:  Instagram:
